children.text:
Spray Painter HELP: 

 Spray Painter is an application simulating spray painting and creating wonderful graffiti on the touch screen of your mobile phone. This application allows you to select one of 12 colors of paints, three spray sizes, background patterns and templates. You can also save your created image as a file. 

 On the main screen of the application you have a desktop where you can paint. Remember â€“ the slower the movement, the more precise painting. Touching the screen for a moment you can paint individual points and grade. 

 You can shake your phone for mix your spray. When you paint in one place, you can see paint leak. 

 At the bottom of the screen you can select options from four icons: 

 - spray size and spray strength
 - select one of 10 spray colors or select Eraser option 
 - Undo or Redo the last brush movement
 - go to the main menu

 You can press phone Back button for go to main menu from image or press Menu button for hide tools menu for paint on bottom screen area. 

 Options in the main menu:  

 - Change background pattern - change the background pattern 
 - Change background color - change the background color
 - Take background photo - make own background with your phone camera
 - Select background from gallery - select background from phone gallery
 - Templates - draw on funny templates!
 - New Image - delete current image and create new image
 - Save/Share Image - save the created graphic to a JPG file, set image as wallpaper or Share your image with friends.
 - Help
 - About
 - More Apps and Games
 - Exit

 

 Enjoy!
